title: 7 Hidden Winter Habits That Worsen Hypertension After 60
description: Identifies common but overlooked seasonal behaviors—like reduced activity and holiday salt intake—that can silently elevate blood pressure in seniors.
coreKeyword: senior blood pressure control in winter

title: The Truth About Salt Intake in Winter: Is Your Diet Riskier Now?
description: Debunks myths about winter cravings and sodium consumption, offering real-world advice for seniors managing hypertension.
coreKeyword: senior blood pressure control in winter

title: The Connection Between Winter Infections and Blood Pressure Fluctuations
description: Explores how common colds, flu, and respiratory illnesses can destabilize hypertension control in seniors.
coreKeyword: senior blood pressure control in winter
